snippet: The Argentine merry-go-round of coaches continued as the first division went into a seven-week summer recess on Monday with Arsenal's Lucas Bernardi quitting after five matches in charge....
lead_paragraph: The Argentine merry-go-round of coaches continued as the first division went into a seven-week summer recess on Monday with Arsenal's Lucas Bernardi quitting after five matches in charge.

headline.main: Bernardi Joins Argentine First Division Coaching Exodus
headline.print_headline: Bernardi Joins Argentine First Division Coaching Exodus
